brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a tabular listing of units of bandwidth.

Unit of Bandwidth: bits per second
Abbreviation: bps
Equivalence: 1 bps = fundamental unit of bandwidth

Unit of Bandwidth: Kilobits per second
Abbreviation: kbps
Equivalence: 1 kbps = 1,000 bps = 10 to the third power bps.

Unit of Bandwidth: Megabits per second
Abbreviation: Mbps
Equivalence: 1 Mbps = 1,000,000 bps = 10 to the sixth power bps.

Unit of Bandwidth: Gigabits per second
Abbreviation: Gbps
Equivalence: 1 Gbps = 1,000,000,000 bps = 10 to the ninth power bps.

Unit of Bandwidth: Terabits per second
Abbreviation: Tbps
Equivalence: 1 Tbps = 1,000,000,000,000 bps = 10 to the twelfth power bps.
